description:
Like the duck boots you had as a kid, but warmer and with a winter-ready makeover. The Sienna 3 combines Kamik’s ultralight rubber with soft uppers that are a blend of flannel and classic leather. The light and flexible rubber lower and outsole offer all-day support and great grip. Waterproof construction ensures helps keep your feet dry in winter slush.

  • Uppers are a blend of classic waterproof leather and warm, water resistant flannel
  • Soft fleecy lining helps wick way moisture and keeps you cozy and warm
  • HEAT-MX™ 90 thermal insulation is light and efficient
  • EVA insoles have Cleansport NXT™ non-toxic odour treatment
  • Lightweight synthetic RubberHe shell and outsole is PVC-free, waterproof, durable and recyclable
  • Heavily lugged outsole has deep aggressive tread that offers improved stability and traction
  • Leather upper, sourced from a tannery rated gold by a third-party environmental audit. The Leather Working Group judges and classifies tanneries based on energy use, waste production and water treatment
  • Manufacturer's active temperature rating down to -20C
name: Kamik Sienna 3 Waterproof Insulated Boots - Women's
